title: PERFUME BALM #FOREST THOUGHT
subtitle: Clary sage | Chamomile | Water Sedge | Cypriol | Amber | Musk | Woody
desc:
PARMAYARD #FOREST THOUGHT

Top Notes: Daisy, Joyful Clary Sage, Water
Middle Notes: Cyperus
Base/After Notes: Musk, Woody Notes, Amber

The herbal scent of chamomile and bitter clary sage, as thick and sweet as honey, creates an addictive scent in a subtle harmony.

It presents a special little comfort to your weary heart by wrapping the water sedge feeling that may feel cold with elegant and soft wood and warm musk.

title: PERFUME BALM #EASE SUNDAY
subtitle: Bergamot | Lime | Cardamom | Cypriol | Cedarwood Atlas | Cucumber | Amyris | Sandalwood
desc:
PARMAYARD #EASE SUNDAY

Top Notes: Citrusy Lemon, Lime, Cardamom
Middle Notes: Cedar, Cucumber
Base/After Notes: Sandalwood, Amyris Blossom

The fresh and bitter scent of lime cardamom is added to the refreshing scent of bergamot, grown under the green energy of the Mediterranean, reminding you of green tangerines ripening slowly under the warm sunlight.

Subsequent to that, the soft curved reverberation of sandalwood gently lingers around, drawing warm memories of a sunny summer day.

title: PERFUME BALM #BLANCHE
subtitle: Nutmeg | Aldehyde | Tea | Iris | Peper | Guaiac wood | Cedarwood Atlas | Mus | Vetive | Amber
desc:
PARMAYARD #BLANCHE

Top Notes: Nutmeg, Tea, Aldehyde
Middle Notes: Pepper, Iris, Guaiac Wood
Base/After Notes: Musk, Vetiver, Cedar

Starts with a refreshing yet understated sweetness as drinking the Tea,leaving a deep and subtle lingering aftertaste. The sweet fruity aroma of bitter darjeeling tea are richly and harmoniously combined to create a feast of elegant fragrance dancing in a teacup. Creamy musk and sandalwood from the tip of the nose make the soft reverberation last for a long time.
